name: Macedonian Stock Exchange Data Processing System

chunks.text: Automates the collection, cleaning, filtering, and storage of historical stock market data from the Macedonian Stock Exchange.
Python, SQL, PostgreSQL, data filtering pipelines.
Applies configurable filters to process large volumes of financial data and stores the results in a database for efficient querying and analysis.
Data updates are automated, enabling continuous data ingestion and reliable access for downstream analytics and visualization.
Helps users organize meals into collections and automatically generate ingredient summaries for grocery shopping.
Built using Onion Architecture with Web, Service, Repository, and Domain layers.
Aggregates ingredients from multiple meals and sends them to the OpenAI API, which returns a structured and summarized shopping list.
ASP.NET Core MVC, C#, OpenAI API integration.
Allows cinema staff to manage movies and screenings, and users to browse movies, view screening schedules, select seats, and book tickets online.
Full-stack ASP.NET Core MVC web application with modular design for admin and user roles.
Includes a chatbot feature to assist users with movie-related information.
ASP.NET Core MVC, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
Provides API endpoints to manage movies, users, screenings, and ticket bookings for the PopcornPass cinema application.
RESTful ASP.NET Core Web API with PostgreSQL database and Dapper for data access.
Includes experimental RAG-based chatbot service for querying movie-related data.
ASP.NET Core, C#, PostgreSQL, Dapper, JSON serialization.
Generates clothing recommendations based on real-time weather data and user preferences.
FastAPI backend orchestrating multiple AI models.
Uses multiple generative AI models for text and image generation with fallback logic to ensure reliability.
Python, FastAPI, ChromaDB, vector embeddings, generative AI models.
Helps pet owners manage pets, track daily activities and events, and interact socially with other users.
ASP.NET MVC web application with modular feature implementation.
None for now (pure full-stack web features).
ASP.NET MVC, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
